website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight option that folds down to nothing inside its conveniently attached compression bag.
pros: This breathable nylon hammock folds into an attached compression sack that's perfect for backpacking
Included tree straps and carabiners ensure you have everything you need to put it up
cons: Some find the fabric to be too thin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, especially for pirates.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our land lubber grandson. He’s smitten with the pirate life. Yo ho yo ho. He’s always playing like he’s on a ship or looking for sunken ships from days past. So every good explorer/pirate needs a place to relax and hang out.
customer_reviews.author: AGray

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great quality and very comfortable. I actually use it on a hammock stand and it works great. It’s very stable. It’s comfortable enough that I used it 2 weeks out of having a total knee replacement and was easy to get in and out. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary (& Joe)

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock - very comfortable and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This is a really comfortable hammock. If you've tried the woven rope hammocks and found that they dig into you, you'll love this one. The included straps make it very easy to set up. The storage bag that is sewn to the edge of the hammock makes it extremely easy to store. And the colors are terrific! Great hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material, but super-strong straps
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is thin and I feel like it may rip through at any minute. It tore in the middle creating a bunch of little holes. Mine WOULD NOT hold two people safely (in my opinion). That said, the colors are nice, the straps are the stuff a hammock-lover dreams of: very sturdy, complete and long. The little pouch is a little annoying, but I like that it can hold the hammock for storage. If the fabric were two-ply this would be absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: very nice quality hammock
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleased with the strength, durability and ease of hanging this hammock.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but I like the functionality. Looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Marron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: As shown. 6 year old can even hang it. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Meals

customer_reviews.title: ... second hammock we have made by Castaway and its great no complaints
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hammock we have made by Castaway and its great no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Yandrich

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable, easy
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift, and I absolutely love it! I keep it in my car at all times just in case. Easy to set up, only takes a minute or two. It's very strong and secure
customer_reviews.author: Warped331

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that it is set up to face a certain side instead of it being level
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Castaway Travel Hammocks Single Size Camping Hammocks with 2 Tree Straps, Triple Stitched Durable Nylon Material, Compact Design for Backpacking, Travel, Beach, Backyard, Patio, Hiking
product_meta.description: Castaway hammocks go just about anywhere you do. Their compact size fits easily into a backpack or simply toss into your vehicle for tailgating or other outdoor adventures. Each measure 8 ft. 9 in. and features triple stitching along each breathable nylon panel. Heavy duty carabiners at each end affixed to the included heavy-duty straps. Folds easily into an attached storage pouch, which doubles as a place to store your keys, drink or phone while relaxing. Holds two people. This Castaway Travel Hammocks Single Size Hammock includes 2 Tree Straps and weighs 2 lbs 8 oz. This Hammock is compact which makes it the ideal hammock for day hikes, travels, and camping.
feature_bullets: CREATE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE: Get outdoors with the perfect hammock setup from Castaway Travel Hammocks and relax!

DURABLE MATERIAL: Breathable yet quick-drying, durable nylon material is built to resist fraying, tearing and dirt build up. The durable nylon material allows your hammock to hold up for years to come throughout all of your adventures.

COMFORTABLE: Constructed of a durable nylon material that unlike competitors, does not sacrifice comfort. The durable yet soft nylon material offers a 400 lb. weight capacity with enough space to provide the most comfortable and relaxing experience ever.

TREE-FRIENDLY STRAPS INCLUDED: No additional purchase is necessary, a set of two 10 ft. long hanging loop designed tree straps is included to ensure a safe and secure hang. The tree straps are designed for an easy setup; simply take out each strap, loop it around the tree, pull through the other end and clip on your carabiner for the perfect hang.
RELAX IMMEDIATELY: With everything needed for the setup being included, the hardest part of your adventure is finding the perfect spot to hang your hammock!
